export default function AdminDashboard({ orders }) { const statusCount = orders.reduce((acc, o) => { acc[o.status] = (acc[o.status] || 0) + 1; return acc; }, {}); const totalRevenue = orders .filter(o => o.status === "PAID" || o.status === "DELIVERED") .reduce((sum, o) => sum + o.total, 0); return (
